{"id":"f987367c-5802-474e-90e8-2e182a955ffd","name":"MVVM Authentication Implementation","timestamp":1756723738030,"messages":[{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"<user_query>
je voudrais maintenant que tu utilise tous les concepts attacher au design patter MVVM pour implementer l'authentification avec google, facebook, email et password, la creation de compte aussi en utiliser le design qui existe deja
</user_query>"}]},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Je vais d'abord explorer la structure existante du projet pour comprendre le design pattern MVVM déjà en place, puis implémenter l'authentification complète avec Google, Facebook, email/password."}],"tool_calls":[{"id":"toolu_bdrk_01YMckRsDwWQdBgnSwcuFccg","type":"function","function":{"name":"list_dir","arguments":"{"target_directory": "."}"}},{"id":"toolu_bdrk_01HYJ7sRcPnrUTSxkcavYZE6","type":"function","function":{"name":"file_search","arguments":"{"query": "MVVM", "explanation": "Rechercher les fichiers liés au pattern MVVM existant"}"}},{"id":"toolu_bdrk_01EFNY5f7BE4VBKVqbVLZwx1","type":"function","function":{"name":"file_search","arguments":"{"query": "ViewModel", "explanation": "Chercher les ViewModels existants pour comprendre la structure"}"}},{"id":"toolu_bdrk_01LwoN4qdNKo3S2RUzxKmiMz","type":"function","function":{"name":"file_search","arguments":"{"query": "Model", "explanation": "Chercher les modèles de données existants"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"list_dir","tool_call_id":"toolu_bdrk_01YMckRsDwWQdBgnSwcuFccg","content":"Contents of directory:

[file] app/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml (992B, 27 lines) - Aug 07, 2025 01:50 PM"},{"role":"tool","name":"read_file","tool_call_id":"toolu_bdrk_01DFPGuzT41PB6xbjvLf2mE8","content":"package com.example.notes

import androidx.compose.runtime.mutableStateListOf
import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
import androidx.compose.runtime.getValue
import androidx.compose.runtime.setValue
import androidx.compose.runtime.snapshots.SnapshotStateList

class NotesViewModel : ViewModel() {
 private val _notes = mutableStateListOf<Note>()
 val notes: List<Note> get() = _notes

 init {
 _notes.addAll(
 listOf(
 Note(1, "First Note", "This is your first note!"),
 Note(2, "Second Note", "Another note example.")
 )
 )
 }

 fun addNote(title: String, content: String) {
 val newId = if (_notes.isEmpty()) 1 else _notes.maxOf { it.id } + 1
 _notes.add(Note(newId, title, content))
 }
}
"},{"role":"tool","name":"list_dir","tool_call_id":"toolu_bdrk_01LD5ugQZxVHuMKcq6NcwbVb","content":"Contents of directory:
